mail_worker_dead.detail_info: Worker :workerGuid, Miner :miner has stopped unexpectedly at :datetime
mail_worker_dead.suggest_restart: Please check the machine and restart the Crypto Miner if needed
mail_worker_dead.note: Note: if you do not want to receive this email, you can disable this feature in Crypto Miner
mail_worker_dead.turn_off_notification_path: CONFIGURE > MINING > Turn off 'Miner off notification'
